subject: VRS DFP20 Direct Force Pro with your wheels?
description_text:
Hi. I'm a new customer with you, waiting on my first order to arrive. I
have more needs.....

How can I use your racing wheels on a VRS SFP20 wheel base. I currently use
an adapter from Sim Race Coach and it has a USB cord. I would love to go
cordless if I found a way. I would be interested in the Simsonn Hub S1
Wheel if I could find a way.

Also, I ordered a Pro-x Handbrake, and hope to also buy a Pro-x
sequential shifter. When will you have those available?


Thank you
Bob Coan
The VIllages, Florida. USA

conversations.body_text: Hi Bob Coan,  Our steering wheels and quick-release mechanisms utilize a universal 70mm bolt pattern. We hope this information proves helpful to you.  We have completed the upgrade of this product and will be relisting it shortly. Thank you for your interest.
